trans-unit.source: Represents a control that can be used to present a collection of objects on a design surface.
trans-unit.target: 디자인 화면에 개체 컬렉션을 표시하는 데 사용할 수 있는 컨트롤을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter> is the second key Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) control provided by the Windows Workflow Foundation designer infrastructure that is collection-based.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter> 컬렉션 기반 Windows Workflow Foundation 디자이너 인프라에서 제공 되는 두 번째 키 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: While the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter> enables the display and the editing of a single contained element, the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter> is collection-based, displays a visualization, and supports editing of the collection of items provided by the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.Items%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 동안는 <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter> 표시 및 포함 된 단일 요소를 편집 하는 데 사용 된 <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter> 는 컬렉션 기반 시각화를 표시 하 고 제공 하는 항목 컬렉션의 편집을 지원는 <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.Items%2A> 속성.

trans-unit.source: In addition to allowing the multiple items contained in the collection to be visualized and edited, the `WorkflowItemsPresenter` also enables collection-oriented actions, such as inserting an item at a given index in the collection, deleting an item from the collection, and moving an item from one index to another.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 시각화 하 고, 편집할 수에 포함 된 여러 항목 수 있을 뿐만 아니라는 `WorkflowItemsPresenter` 또한 항목 컬렉션에서 항목을 삭제 하는 컬렉션의 지정된 된 인덱스에 삽입 하는 등 컬렉션 관련 작업을 사용 하 고 하나의 인덱스에서 항목을 다른 위치로 이동 합니다.

trans-unit.source: `WorkflowItemsPresenter` also handles combined actions, such as dragging between the various presenters and allowing that edit to occur in a single, undoable action.Use <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter> to present a single object on a design surface.
trans-unit.target: `WorkflowItemsPresenter` 또한 핸들에는 다양 한 발표자 간에 끌어서 실행 취소할 수 있는 단일 작업에서 발생 하 여 편집을 허용 하는 등의 작업을 결합 합니다. 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter> 를 디자인 화면에는 단일 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: For an example of the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter> in use, see the [Custom Composite Designers - Workflow Items Presenter](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/custom-composite-designers-workflow-items-presenter.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 예제는 <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter> 사용에서 참조는 [사용자 지정 복합 디자이너-워크플로 항목 프리젠터](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/custom-composite-designers-workflow-items-presenter.md) 샘플.

trans-unit.source: The following sample code shows how you can build a designer for the Parallel activity.
trans-unit.target: 다음 샘플 코드에서는 병렬 작업용 디자이너를 빌드하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: Note the binding to ModelItem.Branches for the Items.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> class.
Gets or sets the type of item supported by the presenter.
trans-unit.target: 발표자가 지원하는 항목 형식을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Type" /> of item supported by the presenter.
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.AllowedItemType" /> dependency property.
The list of objects to be pasted.
Returns a Boolean that indicates whether the specified objects can be pasted.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 개체를 붙여 넣을 수 있는지 여부를 나타내는 부울을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified list of objects can be pasted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 개체 목록을 붙여 넣을 수 있으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object for resolving types used by the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter" />에서 사용하는 형식을 확인하기 위한 개체를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypeResolvingOptions" /> object for resolving types used by the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" />.
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter.DroppingTypeResolvingOptions" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the <see langword="DataTemplate" /> that defines how the footer section of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> control is displayed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> 컨트롤의 바닥글 구역이 표시되는 방법을 정의하는 <see langword="DataTemplate" />을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="DataTemplate" /> that defines how the footer section of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> control is displayed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> 컨트롤의 바닥글 구역이 표시되는 방법을 정의하는 <see langword="DataTemplate" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.FooterTemplate" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the <see langword="DataTemplate" /> that defines how the header section of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> control is displayed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> 컨트롤의 머리글 구역이 표시되는 방법을 정의하는 <see langword="DataTemplate" />을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="DataTemplate" /> that defines how the header section of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> control is displayed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> 컨트롤의 머리글 구역이 표시되는 방법을 정의하는 <see langword="DataTemplate" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.HeaderTemplate" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the string that contains the hint text for the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> 컨트롤에 대한 힌트 텍스트가 포함된 문자열을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The hint text for the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> control.
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.HintText" /> dependency property.
Identifies the index dependency property.
Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the current designer is the default container.
trans-unit.target: 현재 디자이너가 기본 컨테이너인지 여부를 나타내는 부울 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current designer is the default container; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 현재 디자이너가 기본 컨테이너이면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.IsDefaultContainer" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the collection used to generate the content of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" />의 내용을 생성하는 데 사용되는 컬렉션을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="ModelItemCollection" /> used to generate the content of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" />.
Gets or sets the template that defines the panel that controls the layout of items.
trans-unit.target: 항목의 레이아웃을 제어하는 패널을 정의하는 템플릿을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="ItemsPanelTemplate" /> that defines the panel to use for the layout of the items.
trans-unit.target: 항목 레이아웃에 사용할 패널을 정의하는 <see langword="ItemsPanelTemplate" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.ItemsPanel" /> dependency property.
By providing a custom panel template, you can customize and control the layout of the contained items.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 지정 패널 템플릿을 제공하여 포함된 항목의 레이아웃을 사용자 지정 및 제어할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.ItemsPanel%2A> is based on a vertically oriented `StackPanel`.
As an illustration, the `ItemsPanel` for the designer of <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Parallel> activities is based on a horizontally oriented `StackPanel`.
trans-unit.target: 예시의 경우로 `ItemsPanel` 의 디자이너에 대 한 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Parallel> 활동 기반 가로 방향에 `StackPanel`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example in XAML shows the `ItemsPanel` for the designer of <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Parallel> activities that is based on a horizontally oriented `StackPanel`.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서 XAML 보여는 `ItemsPanel` 의 디자이너에 대 한 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Parallel> 기반 활동에서 가로 방향 `StackPanel`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.Items" /> dependency property.

Returns a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" />-specific <see langword="AutomationPeer" /> implementation for the Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: WPF(Windows Presentation Foundation) 인프라에 대한 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> 특정 <see langword="AutomationPeer" /> 구현을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: Implement this method in your derived class to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트에 대한 클래스 처리를 추가하려면 파생 클래스에서 이 메서드를 구현합니다.

trans-unit.source: The type-specific <see langword="AutomationPeer" /> implementation.
Provides data for the drag event.
Occurs when an object is dragged into the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: 개체를 컨트롤의 범위 안으로 끌 때 발생합니다.

trans-unit.source: Provides data for the drag event.
Occurs when an object is dragged over the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: 개체를 컨트롤의 범위 위로 끌 때 발생합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="DragEventArgs" /> instance that contains the event data.
Invoked when an object is dragged into the bounds of a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> 컨트롤의 범위 안으로 개체를 끌면 호출됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Implement this method in your derived class to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트에 대한 클래스 처리를 추가하려면 파생 클래스에서 이 메서드를 구현합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="EventArgs" /> instance that contains the event data.
Invoked when a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> object is initialized.
Implement this method in your derived class to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트에 대한 클래스 처리를 추가하려면 파생 클래스에서 이 메서드를 구현합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> that was moved.
Informs the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> that a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> was moved.
If `modelItem` is in <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.Items%2A>, it is removed.
The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> instances to be copied.
Occurs when the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> instances are cloned.
The copied items.
The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> instances to be cut.
Occurs when the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> instances are cut.
A clone of <paramref name="itemsToCut" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> instances to be deleted.
Occurs when the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> instances are deleted.
The items that has been moved.
Invoked after the start of a move operation to complete the moving of the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 항목의 이동을 완료하기 위해 이동 작업이 시작된 후 호출됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The items to be pasted.
The metadata associated with the items to be pasted.
The location of the paste.
A reference to the paste point.
Pastes the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> instances to the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem" /> 인스턴스를 지정한 위치에 붙여 넣습니다.

trans-unit.source: The selected items to be sorted.
Sorts the selected items.
The list of the sorted items.
Gets or sets the <see langword="DataTemplate" /> that defines how the spacer of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> control is displayed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> 컨트롤의 공백이 표시되는 방식을 정의하는 <see langword="DataTemplate" />을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="DataTemplate" /> that defines how the spacer of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> control is displayed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter" /> 컨트롤의 공백이 표시되는 방식을 정의하는 <see langword="DataTemplate" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.SpacerTemplate" /> dependency property.
